name: Distracting Fog
description: Distracting Fog upgrades your Concealing Fog spell.  All creatures in the area see constant illusory distracting images and hear strange noises.  They suffer a 10 point penalty to Mental Resistance, and a 10 point plus one per caster level penalty to Attack and to Spell Failure.  Creatures are only affected as long as they remain in the fog.
